title: Louisiana's Pierson: Developing Workforce with FastStart(Audio)
itunes:title: Louisiana's Pierson: Developing Workforce with FastStart(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Don Pierson, Louisiana’s Secretary of Economic Development, on LED FastStart, a workforce development initiative that’s helping Louisiana grow its economy while serving as a model for the nation.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
